# **Greetings, R-Ladies!** ðŸ’ž

We are excited to recap the fantastic experience we had at our recent `Women in Technology Web Development Workshop`. This event was a celebration of learning, creativity, and community as we delved into the world of web development using R.

The event was held in partnership with **[R-Ladies NYC](https://www.meetup.com/rladies-newyork/)**, enriching our community collaboration and ensuring a diverse and inclusive learning environment. It was a fantastic opportunity to delve into the world of web development and R programming.

The workshop kicked off with an engaging introduction, setting the stage for an interactive and hands-on session. Participants from diverse backgrounds came together to explore the steps of building a website using R. Guided by a varieties of resources, our attendees navigated through the process with enthusiasm and curiosity.

**Highlights of the Workshop:**

1. **Interactive Learning:** The workshop fostered a collaborative environment where everyone learned from basic concepts to advanced techniques; we covered a wide spectrum of web development principles with `Quarto.`

2. **Hands-On Experience:** Participants had the opportunity to apply their newfound knowledge immediately. Through practical example and guided tutorials, they created their own websites step by step.

3. **Building a Fabulous Website:** By the end of the workshop, each participant successfully crafted a stunning website using R. We are proud to showcase their creativity and achievement.
